title: Book Too: Because of Grandmother
description: Book Too: Because of Grandmother is a continuation on the lifestyle that was read about in Book One: Sporadic Memories. From the granddaughter’s perspective, she goes back on the lifestyle she was raised in, by giving thanks to her grandmother, who raised such an incredible woman … her mother. Book Too: Because of Grandmother is a novel about a lifestyle that needs to be continued.
author: Ali Marsman
